summary: ENGINE CHECK LIGHT KEEPS COMING ON.  MANY HONDA MECHANICS HAVE INPUT TO THIS PROBLEM.  CHECK CODE INDICATES THAT THE SOLENOID BYPASS AND THE TWO WAY VALVE WITHIN THE EMISSION SYSTEM HAVE GONE BAD.  WE WERE BEING BLAMED FOR OVERFILLING THE GAS TANK.  WE DO NOT DO THIS.  FINALLY MECHANICS FIND ANOTHED CHECK CODE INDICATING THE FUEL FILLER NECK HAS A VACUUM LEAK.  ONCE THEY REPLACED FILLER NECK, NO FURTHER PROBLEMS WERE ENCOUNTERED.  DEALERSHIP WAS VANN YORK HONDA IN HIGH POINT NC.
